units.title: Aggregate formation (Day -1)
units.text:
2 × 10^5 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate
50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes uniform hPSC aggregates as the starting material for differentiation.

units.title: Mesoderm induction (Day 0)
units.text:
Start mesoderm differentiation
induction 12 μM CHIR99021, 30 ng/mL BMP-4
units.rationale: Activates WNT and BMP pathways to drive hPSCs toward a mesodermal fate.

units.title: Vascular lineage induction (Day 3)
units.text:
Start vascular differentiation
induction 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 2 μM forskolin
units.rationale: Promotes specification of mesodermal progenitors into endothelial and pericyte lineages.

units.title: Embedding of cell aggregates (Day 5)
units.text:
Vessel sprouting d5 into collagen I–Matrigel matrix (12-well plate)
100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 100 ng/mL FGF-2, 15% FBS
units.rationale: Provides a 3D matrix and growth factors for vascular network formation.

units.title: Extract blood vessel networks (Day 10)
units.text:
Extract blood vessel networks for blood vessel organoid self-assembly
(12-well plate) ~20 min for 1 well (~50–60 organoids)
units.rationale: Isolates individual vascular structures to generate discrete organoids.

units.title: Transplant organoids into mice (Day 15)
units.text:
Transplant into immuno Box 1
(96-well plate) compromised (NSG) mice
units.rationale: Tests functional integration of organoids in an in vivo environment.

units.title: Prepare collagen I solution for embedding
units.text: To prepare 5 mL of 2.0 mg/mL collagen I solution (enough for one 12-well plate), mix 750 µL of 0.1 N NaOH, 313 µL of 10× DMEM, 63 µL of HEPES, 49 µL of 7.5% sodium bicarbonate, 31 µL of Glutamax, 460 µL of Ham’s F-12 and 3.33 mL of PureCol.
units.rationale: Creates the collagen component of the matrix used for 3D culture of aggregates.

units.title: Wash hPSCs with EDTA
units.text: 1 Wash hPSCs with 0.5 mM EDTA by removing E8 medium and replacing it with 0.6 mL of 0.5 mM EDTA per well of a 6-well plate.
units.rationale: Gentle dissociation step that prepares cells for aggregation.

units.title: Resuspend cells in aggregation medium with Y‑27632
units.text: 9 Resuspend the cells in fresh aggregation medium (3 mL per well) containing 50 μM Y-27632.
units.rationale: Ensures cell survival and promotes aggregate formation during the first day.

units.title: Fix transplants in 4% PFA
units.text: 3 Fix transplants and kidney tissue in 4% PFA solution overnight at 4 °C.
units.rationale: Preserves tissue morphology for downstream histological analysis.
